panels.title: Nova: from which idx the selected host came from
Manila: from which idx the selected host came from

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(cortex_scheduler_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status=~"2.+"}[2m])) by (le, method, path, status, error))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(cortex_scheduler_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status=~"4.+|5.+"}[2m])) by (le, method, path, status, error))

panels.title: Time needed to run scheduler steps
Time needed to run descheduler steps

targets.expr: sum by (error, skipped, source_host, target_host, vm_id) (delta(cortex_descheduler_pipeline_vm_descheduling_duration_seconds_count{}[2m]))
